message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this deal now, or you'll regret it!
Alice, my turn. I'm feeling generous, but let's wrap this up quickly.
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'll be even more generous than you were, but don't push your luck!
Alice, let's be realistic. I need a good deal, and this is my final offer.
Okay, Bob, last chance. I'm matching your offer, but with the shares reversed. Take it or leave it!
